G

getButtonNum() - Method in class brailleSimulator.Button
Returns the button number.
getCellConfig() - Method in class brailleSimulator.Braille
Return all the cells and their state in an array of eight characters Strings with the first cell corresponding to the first element of the array, Cell 2 with second element and so on.
getNumCells() - Method in class brailleSimulator.Braille
Gets the number of cells activated in braille simulator.
getPinConfig() - Method in class brailleSimulator.Cell
Returns an eight character long String consisting of 1 and 0 to represent the state of each pin.
getState() - Method in class brailleSimulator.Pin
Gets the state of the pin.
getView() - Method in class brailleSimulator.BrailleClient
NOTE: THIS IS NOT PART OF THE API/JAVADOC.
